content: So for tomorrow's foundations tweet, should I plan on skipping Jupyter content for now?
yeah, you can just use the next one on the list
We don't have that one up yet either, heh. Maybe I just start diving into NumPy?
Related; y'all mind if I retweet our MetPy workshop announcement? Or is that a bit too specific of a plug for us
Go for it!!
Alright actual question ft sanity check: is the tone of this too far off for y'all? I don't wanna class clown it up too much without y'all's approval image.png
What's mathemagic? hahah
magical mathematics!
Though that does bring up the point that maybe I shouldn't butcher the readability too much heh
yeahhh other than that one word, I like the tone! I think it's good to be fun :)
Alright hear me out: "Pythia" (or "Python") + "Thursday"...
welcome to #PyThursdays
Just an FYI, we don't currently have anything lined up for next week's foundations tweet
Maybe tweet about Cartopy? It's also okay to miss a week.
Hello my pythiAGU friends: has someone taken ownership of tweeting about the feedback form/sticker opportunity next week during AGU? If not I'll be glad to
(since I missed this week's OWG)
That'd be great if you could do that!
Just sent this out, feel free to RT or otherwise let people know

Can someone remind me the Twitter password?

Or tweet out a reminder about today's tutorial!

Is it:
P1vOT2-Pyth0n!
I keep getting a wrong password
Ahh no "O"s only "0"s
Sorry - just saw this now!
Sorry I missed today's meeting. I had an emergency with my fish tank that I needed to address ASAP
oh my goodness! I hope things have remained as dry and healthy as possible :(
Thanks! I took care of it for now
Grateful again that the password is in this channel haha
